ResourceHeader.AlternateName: The Logical Observatory created to represent the chain of magnetic field stations used to calculate the Dst Index.
ResourceHeader.Description: The Logical Observatory created to represent the virtual chain of stations used to calculate the Dst Index. The chain of stations includes: Hermanus, Honolulu, Kakioka, and San Juan.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If Dst Index data are used in publication kindly acknowledge the World Data Center C2 for Geomagnetism, Kyoto University for the index production and distribution.

InformationURL.Name: The Geomagnetic Equatorial Dst index Home Page.
InformationURL.Description: The web site with links to pages describing the internationally accepted standard technique for generating the Dst Index and for access to the index data in WDC format.
